    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.String> connect(java.lang.String username,
                                                                    java.lang.String password)
        Attempts to establish a connection to the database with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        username - is the username.
        password - is the password.
        Returns:
        a Boolean, String pair. The Boolean represents the success of the connection. If false, the connection failed and the String contains the appropriate error message.

      • getConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getConnection()

        Returns:
        an instance of the connection.

      • viewTable

        public double viewTable(java.sql.Connection con,
                        java.lang.String table,
                        java.lang.String column)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Does a select to a table given by the parameter table.
        Parameters:
        con - is the connection to the database.
        table - is the name of the table.
        column - is the column of the table that we want to select.
        Returns:
        a double value relative to the select.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when failing to create or execute the select statement.
